newsitem.title: USA: AICHI TAKES 20 PCT STAKE IN LOUISVILLE.
newsitem.headline: AICHI TAKES 20 PCT STAKE IN LOUISVILLE.

text.p: Louisville Forge and Gear Works Inc said Friday it Aichi Steel Works Ltd will take a 20 percent equity position in the company in exchange for cash and technical assitance.
Private Louisville said the deal, which expands a technology agreement it already had with the Japanese steel maker, will enable it to streamline its core business.

A spokesman said the deal is structured as a joint venture, in which Aichi holds a 20 percent interest. Louisville will transfer all its assets to the joint venture and rename itself Louisville Forge and Gear Works LLC.
